Property Location
When you stay at Lakeside Lodge Motel in Lismore, you'll be on a lake and convenient to Lismore Gaelic Heritage Centre and Lismore Visitor Information Centre. This family-friendly motel is within close proximity of Lismore Workers Golf Club.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 15 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and microwaves. Rooms have private furnished patios. 81-cm LED televisions with cable programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Private bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers.

Dining
Take advantage of the motel's room service (during limited hours).

Business, Other Amenities
Free self parking is available onsite.
